bewildering the number of different

for smartphones they have Android and

to get access to the Internet and it has
a head-up display so you can wear

videos and images stream them and what
they did was they had a guy in a plane

cut to him wearing the glasses and he

pulled his parachute landed on the top

impressed but this year it was very low
key it was aimed at developers and it
was also aimed at Apple so they have
three key services that are really
targeting Apple the first is Google Play
Google Play really is iTunes it's aimed
at you know for music downloads and
there's an educational arm as well which
is quite smart strategically the next

now Google now is like a personal
assistant and it's targeted at Siri so

will actually preempt information that
